name: An Imps Journey
description: This is my first ever game jam made this with a friend we both have very little knowledge about making games probably around a month of just messing around with godot.  As such we made this game using godot  and it is  just a little simple game where you fight two types of enemies. Originally we were planning on having it be more of an exploring open world game with different quests and a comedic story, sadly we ran out of time to implement everything to actually complete the game but we did learn a lot
